conbody.p: comes with a library of system DPFs:

ul.li: PHEMI VCF Data Processing Function. This system DPF processes Variant Call Format (VCF) data. A VCF data file is typically very large (on the order of gigabytes). For this reason, a VCF file is always parsed into records as the file is ingested. In the System Metrics Task Monitoring screen, you will always see the processing task (derive) for this DPF chained to an ingest task.
Microsoft Excel Workbook Data Processing Function. This system DPF processes Excel workbooks. The workbook is parsed into rows and each row becomes a separate record.
